review.reviewBody: I live in Brecon and I had problems with rats in my property. I was told to ring Welsh Town & Country Pest Services. I donâ€™t normally post reviews but this company was super helpful. Call out was super fast, highly recommend.

David from Welsh Town & Country Pest Services sorted out a mole problem in my garden in Merthyr. He uses traditional poison-free trapping which was perfect for us with pets and kids. Turned up quickly, very professional.
Great service, highly recommend. Thankfully they cover Merthyr Tydfil. David from Welsh Town & Country Pest Services came out, explained everything step by step, called back as promised.
Called Welsh Town & Country Pest Services in the early hours after failing to get through to other companies. We had a rat in our attic! They arrived in just over an hour.
